basisSet.dc:title: cc-pCVQZ
basisSet.dct:abstract: QZ3P Quadruple Zeta + Polarization + Tight Core
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Polarized Core/Valence Quadruple Zeta (cc-pCVQZ) Basis ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References Li - Ne: (15s,9p,5d,3f,1g) -> [8s,7p,5d,3f,1g] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 90, 1007 (1989). Na : (22s,15p,6d,4f,2g) -> [9s,8p,6d,4f,2g] D.E. Woon, K.A. Peterson and Mg : (19s,15p,6d,4f,2g) -> [9s,8p,6d,4f,2g] T.H. Dunning, Jr. (to be published) Al - Ar: (19s,14p,6d,4f,2g) -> [9s,8p,6d,4f,2g] D. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 103, 4572 (1995) Ca : (25s,19p,10d,4f,2g)-> [10s,9p,7d,4f,2g] J. Koput and K.A. Peterson, J. Phys. Chem. A, 106, 9595 (2002) K.A. Peterson (to be published)
The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation.
